original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.89. Saraṇaduka, Ajjhattārammaṇattika🔽Saraṇaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya          saraṇam ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati
translated: The Triad on the Refuges, the Triad on the Internal Sense-spheres🔽With a non-refuge internal sense-sphere as condition there arises a non-refuge non-internal sense-sphere element.

original: hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā araṇam ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo
translated: With a non-refuge internal sense-sphere as condition there arises a non-refuge non-internal sense-sphere element.

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve, aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.🔽Saraṇaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve aññamaññe ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve  saraṇam bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati
translated: With a non-refuge internal sense-sphere as condition there arises a non-refuge non-internal sense-sphere element.🔽With a non-refuge external sense-sphere as condition there arises a non-refuge non-external sense-sphere element.

original: hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā araṇam bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammo
translated: With a non-refuge external sense-sphere as condition there arises a non-refuge non-external sense-sphere element.

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve, aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve aññamaññe ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve
translated: With a non-refuge external sense-sphere as condition there arises a non-refuge non-external sense-sphere element.
